data.meta_description: I’m happy to share that I’ve obtained a new certification: Ahli Teknik Bangunan Gedung Madya from Lembaga Pengembangan Jasa Konstruksi!

Refreshment regarding Basic Equipment Philosophy (BEP 3.0). Speakers from the Institut Teknologi Kalimantan provided academic insight and speaker from practitioners provided practical insight. 5 days of training which made me think more philosophically regarding every piece of equipment operated. September, Swiss-Bellhotel Balikpapapan. #training #equipment #refinery

Hello everyone, I'm Kautsarindra Arifan Let me present to you about my final project with the title "Evaluation of The Implementation of 5s and Total Productive Maintenance To Increase The Value of Overall Equipment Effectiveness In The Indarung 6 Raw Mill Area (Case Study: PT Semen Padang)"

Hopefully this Japanese technique can help you to be more productive and fight laziness. With enthusiasm and hard work, the results of our work will be better. Hope it is useful! Don't forget to share with your other friends. _ Solusi Sinergi Teknik Jl.
